reviewText: I watched this late night series when it first aired and it is excellent. I wish I had videotaped all of the episodes but am glad that I have the ones that I did record. It's been quite the wait for it to reach a dvd incarnation.
I don't have it this yet,but i know its a great series,iv'e seen them all,and i cant wait until this Freddy series becomes avalible again. I cant wait....really.
I wish it could be available someday. I never saw this series before and I hope it will be available soon.
